name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic game of X's and O's. Try to get three in a row!

name: Classic Snake
description: Guide the snake to eat the food and grow longer. Don't hit the walls!
Slide the tiles to merge numbers and try to reach the 2048 tile.

name: Flappy Bird
description: Tap to make the bird fly and guide it through the pipes.

name: Pac-Man
description: Eat all the dots in the maze while avoiding the ghosts!

name: Tetris
description: Arrange the falling blocks to create and clear horizontal lines.
